title: Authors and Citation
text: Aden-Buie G (2023). lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text. https://github.com/gadenbuie/lorem, http://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/lorem/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text},   author = {Garrick Aden-Buie},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/gadenbuie/lorem, http://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/lorem/}, }

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Quickly generate lorem ipsum placeholder text lorem::ipsum(). Easy integrate RMarkdown documents. Includes RStudio addin insert lorem ipsum current document.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: can install latest released version lorem CRAN current development version lorem GitHub r-universe
code: install.packages("lorem") # GitHub # install.packages("remotes") rmeotes::install_github("gadenbuie/lorem")  # R Universe install.packages('lorem', repos = c('https://gadenbuie.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: lorem includes simple addin RStudio adds placeholder lorem ipsum text current source document. addin allows specify number desired paragraphs sentences.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Another way generate lorem ipsum placeholder text call lorem::ipsum() inline R chunk R Markdown. Sit nunc convallis fringilla semper. Penatibus vivamus eget malesuada cursus fames magnis potenti. Venenatis ligula enim conubia laoreet orci, class ligula. Massa sem sed enim risus ut mattis inceptos nisl elementum mattis. Nostra ultricies habitant donec vitae luctus proin gravida placerat ac libero imperdiet! Auctor habitasse faucibus ultricies purus eget sociis ultrices habitasse: nec ad aptent lectus rutrum proin potenti, montes, sodales, posuere convallis tempor erat, egestas magna lectus sociis mollis purus. Dolor turpis euismod himenaeos interdum felis dictum tempus euismod tortor aliquam! Eget interdum vehicula laoreet quam mollis, justo cursus ad blandit feugiat pulvinar? Sem sodales bibendum leo leo magna pulvinar metus lacinia nam. Fringilla maecenas duis dis suscipit aenean natoque sem metus, quam risus sagittis convallis primis sociis id dictumst. can control number paragraphs sentences per paragraph. Amet cras primis ac neque primis dui scelerisque massa inceptos massa. Adipiscing netus cursus – vivamus est aliquam mauris pharetra: nostra ornare. Tristique ad consequat sagittis montes sociis, ut cursus tincidunt vitae sagittis netus! Adipiscing aptent libero vitae etiam tristique commodo iaculis erat mattis tempor convallis. Porta aenean natoque, feugiat himenaeos – ac accumsan mollis torquent ut maecenas congue vulputate nulla! Interdum fames. can also adjust avg_words_per_sentence create long short paragraphs. Elit facilisis curae pharetra quisque per? Euismod risus phasellus euismod velit, orci platea? Na platea. Amet posuere habitasse imperdiet. Porta tempor felis morbi. Est nam nisl litora viverra? Accumsan feugiat volutpat cubilia purus. Na purus. Elit venenatis tincidunt urna sagittis integer posuere dignissim. Dui tellus massa nam suspendisse venenatis dui nec imperdiet donec magna libero elementum euismod nibh ligula conubia vitae, ad egestas dis himenaeos ligula urna, dui parturient lacus montes semper ultricies euismod non condimentum porta sem luctus porttitor platea hac sagittis!
code: `r lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 2)` `r lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3, sentences = c(1, 2, 3))` `r lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 3)` `r lorem::ipsum(1, avg_words_per_sentence = 20)`

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Generate lorem ipsum anywhere else using lorem::ipsum() lorem::ipsum_words(). purus enim pellentesque blandit facilisis elementum interdum suscipit enim urna urna elementum nec vitae scelerisque scelerisque faucibus dignissim urna interdum curabitur porttitor dui euismod
code: ipsum_items <- replicate(5, lorem::ipsum_words(5)) cat(paste("-", ipsum_items), sep = "\n")

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Thank Luke Haas node module getlorem providing lorem ipsum word list used package.

what: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text:
Renders ipsum() placeholder text HTML tags using htmltools::.tags(). default, paragraphs rendering

tags htmltools::p(), may provide paragraph wrapper function. general, need manually call function, instead can just drop ipsum() text another htmltools::tag().

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
code: # S3 method for lorem as.tags(x, wrapper = NULL, ...)

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text: x Object converted. wrapper function takes character string paragraph chunk placeholder text returns htmltools::tag(). default, lorem ipsum text wrapped htmltools::p(). ... additional parameters.

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text: Returns htmltools::tagList().

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
code:
htmltools::div( lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3) ) #>
#>

Sit dictum sociis torquent ullamcorper in vulputate ac tristique, consequat – class etiam mauris. Porttitor quam in proin nullam nisi bibendum pulvinar bibendum mus viverra morbi. Ac bibendum fermentum lacus, congue diam posuere iaculis venenatis lectus habitant. Pulvinar scelerisque natoque inceptos lacus at augue, arcu nisi cubilia.

#>

Dolor tristique natoque litora lacus pulvinar neque et malesuada varius. Sociosqu natoque faucibus tristique tortor, faucibus dapibus: ut metus dis donec? Laoreet potenti, potenti varius metus natoque ad malesuada? Euismod mollis a condimentum potenti?

#>

Ipsum sociis fringilla luctus lobortis viverra sollicitudin blandit – sapien netus. Sociis mi dictum dis facilisis rhoncus porta platea? Class tellus velit penatibus semper, id cursus vitae dictum, quis molestie leo. Ridiculus donec praesent habitant a hac cras elementum ante. Aptent convallis tempor – erat vulputate sollicitudin magnis facilisis. Scelerisque eu nunc nascetur parturient nibh nam quis leo luctus.

#>
htmltools::tags$ul( htmltools::as.tags( lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3, sentences = 1), wrapper = htmltools::tags$li ) ) #>
    #>
  • Ipsum phasellus suscipit cursus sem varius iaculis erat diam platea?
    • #>
  • Adipiscing nascetur ornare semper cubilia fames sociosqu lacinia netus at luctus pretium.
    • #>
  • Consectetur ac habitasse bibendum erat vitae cursus varius est lacinia!
    • #>

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: Generates lorem ipsum placeholder text requested number sentences paragraphs. can control number sentences per paragraph average number words per sentence, simply enter number desired paragraphs completely random experience. lorem::ipsum() uses sampling random number generator makes effort shield placeholder text generation main script, please use package temporary placeholder text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: ipsum(paragraphs = 1, sentences = NULL, avg_words_per_sentence = 10)  ipsum_words(n, collapse = TRUE)  ipsum_starts(n)

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: paragraphs Number paragraphs text generate. sentences Number sentences per paragraph. NULL, random number sentences per paragraph (approximately 3-8) chosen. Alternatively, sentences can vector integers representing number sentences per paragraph. avg_words_per_sentence Number expected words per sentence. n Number words generate collapse words collapsed single string, separated spaces (default)? FALSE, chosen words returned character vector.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: character vector lorem ispum placeholder text, element vector paragraph text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: ipsum(): Generate paragraphs sentences lorem ipsum text. ipsum_words(): Generate lorem ipsum words, without punctuation. ipsum_starts(): Generate lorem ipsum starting words.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: can influence, degree, amount punctuation included output using lorem.punctuation_valence option. global option number 0 1, FALSE disable punctuation altogether. value closer 1, punctuation included sentences. value closer 0, less punctuation inserted. default value 0.4.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: # 1 paragraph of text lorem::ipsum(1) #> <lorem> #> Adipiscing torquent purus tempor, class orci taciti porttitor phasellus #> suscipit tempor. Feugiat facilisi vel nullam convallis luctus litora #> litora, vehicula augue? Porta proin malesuada fames scelerisque eu, #> dis, ornare dignissim tempor litora. Pretium netus eros venenatis #> malesuada integer in nullam – ornare – eu phasellus quisque. Semper #> gravida placerat cum, magnis urna parturient felis, arcu taciti varius #> mollis. Na mollis!  # 2 paragraphs with 2 and 3 sentences each lorem::ipsum(2, sentences = c(2, 3)) #> <lorem> #> Lorem vel viverra dapibus commodo, platea, urna; gravida, nisl facilisi #> per sodales! Sem nisl aenean odio; urna leo. #>  #> Sit nisi egestas sociis, aliquam praesent nibh netus. Enim malesuada #> duis; consequat; augue tincidunt donec accumsan tellus. Imperdiet mi #> potenti sapien mattis dictum pellentesque enim euismod montes per #> felis.  # 2 paragraphs with short sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 4) #> <lorem> #> Amet consequat vivamus eu iaculis. #>  #> Consectetur arcu lacus tristique? Augue integer morbi pretium! Ornare #> molestie libero nulla. Dis habitant nec at. Lobortis ultrices cras enim #> habitant. Fermentum nullam tortor malesuada in. Leo augue diam porta #> vitae. Condimentum magna porttitor dictumst luctus. Na luctus.  # 2 paragraphs with long sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 20) #> <lorem> #> Ipsum cubilia hac aptent taciti in interdum cubilia, per; rutrum #> venenatis a. Sollicitudin aenean vehicula aptent semper! Suscipit #> senectus cubilia – arcu nibh ultrices nec potenti urna parturient. #> Ligula pharetra nec varius eros venenatis quis magna nam vel felis #> luctus aptent semper, congue magnis cras cubilia aliquet vitae; #> sociosqu eget primis augue rutrum curae suscipit auctor, natoque, urna #> vivamus turpis sociosqu dignissim eleifend iaculis, montes curae enim #> cursus taciti, facilisi quis augue sollicitudin platea fermentum #> viverra pellentesque ad scelerisque a in lobortis volutpat. #>  #> Sit nulla ornare laoreet nostra litora dictum sociis! A vehicula #> gravida ultrices, primis auctor quisque vivamus aliquam rhoncus quisque #> eros. Aptent taciti ut fringilla libero. Non platea nisl ornare class #> tincidunt suscipit conubia auctor et netus platea vitae venenatis, #> netus torquent, condimentum praesent – facilisis placerat nostra congue #> quisque aenean aenean, sem facilisi netus varius vitae class porttitor, #> pretium id, himenaeos non augue elementum eleifend hac nascetur posuere #> donec vel conubia risus ad cubilia!

what: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
title: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
text: Quickly generate lorem ipsum placeholder text. Easy integrate RMarkdown documents. Includes RStudio addin insert lorem ipsum current document.

title: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
text: Maintainer: Garrick Aden-Buie garrick@adenbuie.com (ORCID)

title: lorem 1.0.0
text:
CRAN release: 2023-03-09 first official release lorem CRAN! small changes happened package since first released GitHub: lorem::ipsum() now returns lorem classed object works knitr R chunks htmltools tags. htmltools, paragraph automatically wrapped

tag, can call .tags() directly provide wrapper. change required ipsum() return list-like lorem class rather character vector; use format() .character() retrieve standard character vectors. Thanks @cpsievert suggestion (#7, #8). lorem::ipsum() now includes punctuation like commas, colons, semi-colons em dashes generated text (#4).
